price: 23. Mpe Molingani naye akoloba: Tala oyo ezali epai na ngai, ezali pembeni.
arabic: وَقَالَ قَرِينُهُۥ هَٰذَا مَا لَدَيَّ عَتِيدٌ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: waqāla qarīnuhu hādhā mā ladayya ʿatīdun
